In order to make an offline donation we ask that you please follow these instructions:
  1. Make a check payable to "Charity"
  2. On the memo line of the check, please indicate that the donation is for "Charity"
  3. Please mail your check to:
Charity 111 Not A Real St. Anytown, CA 12345 All contributions will be gratefully acknowledged and are tax deductible.
Thank you to all our donors, we have met our fundraising goal.

item.dc:creator: pennyblack
item.content:encoded:
Save the Kindness

HELPING POORS BRINGS PEACE IN YOU AND PROVIDE SATISFACTION IN YOUR LIFETIME. LETS FEEL FREE TO HELP THE PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT HAVING ANYTHING EXCEPT YOUR HELP. Donate Now [give_form id="355"][give_form id="566"]

Various Causes

Poverty

80% of the people struggling to get their life essentials. To those, we raise our hands to get better life and health. Your donation will help to improve their lifestyle. (51%) 51% $54,000/ $1,00,000

Drought

In a world, lot of people struggling to get clean water because of drought around the world. Water level gone down further. To make awareness how to store rain water, donate now. (72%) 72% $54,000/ $1,00,000

Education

We aware good education will change everything from hell to heaven. To get that divine education for the people, we educate people who all are living in remote vilages. donate now. (41%) 41% $54,000/ $1,00,000

Kindness Towards Humanity

Who We Care

We are group of volunteers try to help helpless people through not only by money but by providing good education, foods and ideas. We are not enough to help countless people who are seeking attention and care. We welcome more volunteers in terms of helping poors. We are group of volunteers try to help helpless people through not only by money but by providing good education, foods and ideas. We are not enough to help countless people who are seeking attention and care. We welcome more volunteers in terms of helping poors. Learn More

Our Helps To Reduce

Education

Education will change evil things and provide good things to human. We try to educate people who all are wants.

Drought

By harvesting rainwater we can avoid drought and other sequences. We provide equipments and ideas to avoid those.

Child Labour

Employment of children in an industry, especially considered exploitative. We educate people to get awareness about this.

Poverty

By providing foods alone reduce the poverty. With that we provide useful tips and ideas to reduce theirs.

Infanticide

Female infanticide is a crime which most worsen thing in the world. We educate people to get awareness about this.

War Violence

Bringing down war between countries and inside the country is one of the goal of our community.

Camps We Done

Education Camp

Last month, we had a great education camp for two weeks which brings most enthuastic things to people who attend the meetings. We brings best educationist to teach people who are willing to learn. Its a successfull campaign. Read More

Blood Donation

Last week, we had a blood donation camp in a village Dthohyo, Kenya. Lot of people donated blood and had a certificate from the charity team. This will boost us to run most blood donation camp in the future. Read More

Poverty Relief

Few days back, we ran poverty relief camp in Towndown Hall, Newyork. We received and honored our chief guest and started our camp grantly. We collected the funds from our beloved donors. In the end of campaign. Read More

We Honour Our Top Donators

Education Camp For Poor

Few days back, we ran poverty relief camp in Towndown Hall, Newyork. We received and honored our chief guest and started our camp grantly. We collected the funds from our beloved donors. In the end of campaign. Read More

Donate Now To Orphan Children

We are raising our hands to help orphan children in the world. To show mercy on helpless children, please donate by clicking below button. Donate Now

Gallery

Our Latest News

Relief Camp in December

We are planned to run a relief camp in the upcoming month. Its going to be a great successfull by the people having god hearted. In this camp, we will receive fund, food, garment materials. We are planned to run a relief camp in the upcoming month. Its going to be a great successfull by the people having god hearted. In this camp, we will receive fund, food, garment materials.

Our Volunteers

Jessica Joe

Jessica Joe is our beloved kind hearted volunteers having great heart to help helpless. In her busy schedule, she helping people regularly. She raising few children for their food and education. She wants to help people inregardless of the religion and countries.

John Peter

John Peter is lovely guy who is having great ideas to help people irrespective of the money but technically. By having his guide, we can easily reach and teach uneducated people. He is techie and his techniques are easy to understand for people who all are uneducated.

Best Moment In Our Life

Testimonial

"Charity is one of the best NGO in the world. Their motivation towards helpless people is great. I wish them to have great futue and ongoing. I want to regularly work with them."

Mark Davis, Social Activist

Faq

Who We Are and Why?

We are group of volunteers and have a properly registered NGO. Please visit our site to get more details.

How To Become Volunteers?

To become volunteer of our NGO, visit our website or our office which is in 11, HOWENT Road, NewYork

How Can I Donate To The Orphanage?

You can donate by using our website or can provide check and mailed to our address. We welcome you.

item.dc:creator: pennyblack
item.content:encoded:
Save the Kindness

HELPING POORS BRINGS PEACE IN YOU AND PROVIDE SATISFACTION IN YOUR LIFETIME. LETS FEEL FREE TO HELP THE PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT HAVING ANYTHING EXCEPT YOUR HELP. Donate Now [give_form id="355"][give_form id="566"]

Various Causes

Poverty

80% of the people struggling to get their life essentials. To those, we raise our hands to get better life and health. Your donation will help to improve their lifestyle. (51%) 51% $54,000/ $1,00,000

Drought

In a world, lot of people struggling to get clean water because of drought around the world. Water level gone down further. To make awareness how to store rain water, donate now. (72%) 72% $54,000/ $1,00,000

Education

We aware good education will change everything from hell to heaven. To get that divine education for the people, we educate people who all are living in remote vilages. donate now. (41%) 41% $54,000/ $1,00,000

Kindness Towards Humanity

Who We Care

We are group of volunteers try to help helpless people through not only by money but by providing good education, foods and ideas. We are not enough to help countless people who are seeking attention and care. We welcome more volunteers in terms of helping poors. We are group of volunteers try to help helpless people through not only by money but by providing good education, foods and ideas. We are not enough to help countless people who are seeking attention and care. We welcome more volunteers in terms of helping poors. Learn More

Our Helps To Reduce

Education

Education will change evil things and provide good things to human. We try to educate people who all are wants.

Drought

By harvesting rainwater we can avoid drought and other sequences. We provide equipments and ideas to avoid those.

Child Labour

Employment of children in an industry, especially considered exploitative. We educate people to get awareness about this.

Poverty

By providing foods alone reduce the poverty. With that we provide useful tips and ideas to reduce theirs.

Infanticide

Female infanticide is a crime which most worsen thing in the world. We educate people to get awareness about this.

War Violence

Bringing down war between countries and inside the country is one of the goal of our community.

Camps We Done

Education Camp

Last month, we had a great education camp for two weeks which brings most enthuastic things to people who attend the meetings. We brings best educationist to teach people who are willing to learn. Its a successfull campaign. Read More

Blood Donation

Last week, we had a blood donation camp in a village Dthohyo, Kenya. Lot of people donated blood and had a certificate from the charity team. This will boost us to run most blood donation camp in the future. Read More

Poverty Relief

Few days back, we ran poverty relief camp in Towndown Hall, Newyork. We received and honored our chief guest and started our camp grantly. We collected the funds from our beloved donors. In the end of campaign. Read More

Education Camp For Poor

Few days back, we ran poverty relief camp in Towndown Hall, Newyork. We received and honored our chief guest and started our camp grantly. We collected the funds from our beloved donors. In the end of campaign. Read More

Donate Now To Orphan Children

We are raising our hands to help orphan children in the world. To show mercy on helpless children, please donate by clicking below button. Donate Now

We are planned to run a relief camp in the upcoming month. Its going to be a great successfull by the people having god hearted. In this camp, we will receive fund, food, garment materials. We are planned to run a relief camp in the upcoming month. Its going to be a great successfull by the people having god hearted. In this camp, we will receive fund, food, garment materials.

Our Volunteers

Jessica Joe

Jessica Joe is our beloved kind hearted volunteers having great heart to help helpless. In her busy schedule, she helping people regularly. She raising few children for their food and education. She wants to help people inregardless of the religion and countries.

John Peter

John Peter is lovely guy who is having great ideas to help people irrespective of the money but technically. By having his guide, we can easily reach and teach uneducated people. He is techie and his techniques are easy to understand for people who all are uneducated.

Best Moment In Our Life

We are group of volunteers and have a properly registered NGO. Please visit our site to get more details.

item.title: demo-3
item.dc:creator: pennyblack
item.content:encoded:
Save the Kindness

HELPING POORS BRINGS PEACE IN YOU AND PROVIDE SATISFACTION IN YOUR LIFETIME. LETS FEEL FREE TO HELP THE PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT HAVING ANYTHING EXCEPT YOUR HELP. Donate Now [give_form id="355"][give_form id="566"]

Various Causes

Poverty

80% of the people struggling to get their life essentials. To those, we raise our hands to get better life and health. Your donation will help to improve their lifestyle. (51%) 51% $54,000/ $1,00,000

Drought

In a world, lot of people struggling to get clean water because of drought around the world. Water level gone down further. To make awareness how to store rain water, donate now. (72%) 72% $54,000/ $1,00,000

Education

We aware good education will change everything from hell to heaven. To get that divine education for the people, we educate people who all are living in remote vilages. donate now. (41%) 41% $54,000/ $1,00,000

Kindness Towards Humanity

Who We Care

We are group of volunteers try to help helpless people through not only by money but by providing good education, foods and ideas. We are not enough to help countless people who are seeking attention and care. We welcome more volunteers in terms of helping poors. We are group of volunteers try to help helpless people through not only by money but by providing good education, foods and ideas. We are not enough to help countless people who are seeking attention and care. We welcome more volunteers in terms of helping poors. Learn More

Our Helps To Reduce

Education

Education will change evil things and provide good things to human. We try to educate people who all are wants.

Drought

By harvesting rainwater we can avoid drought and other sequences. We provide equipments and ideas to avoid those.

Child Labour

Employment of children in an industry, especially considered exploitative. We educate people to get awareness about this.

Poverty

By providing foods alone reduce the poverty. With that we provide useful tips and ideas to reduce theirs.

Infanticide

Female infanticide is a crime which most worsen thing in the world. We educate people to get awareness about this.

War Violence

Bringing down war between countries and inside the country is one of the goal of our community.

Camps We Done

Education Camp

Last month, we had a great education camp for two weeks which brings most enthuastic things to people who attend the meetings. We brings best educationist to teach people who are willing to learn. Its a successfull campaign. Read More

Blood Donation

Last week, we had a blood donation camp in a village Dthohyo, Kenya. Lot of people donated blood and had a certificate from the charity team. This will boost us to run most blood donation camp in the future. Read More

Poverty Relief

Few days back, we ran poverty relief camp in Towndown Hall, Newyork. We received and honored our chief guest and started our camp grantly. We collected the funds from our beloved donors. In the end of campaign. Read More

We Honour Our Top Donators

Nov 20, 2016 Montreal, Qc

Our Involvements

Education Camp For Poor

Last month, we had a great education camp for two weeks which brings most enthuastic things to people who attend the meetings. We brings best educationist to teach people who are willing to learn. Its a successfull campaign. Read More

War Prevention initiative

Last week, we had a blood donation camp in a village Dthohyo, Kenya. Lot of people donated blood and had a certificate from the charity team. This will boost us to run most blood donation camp in the future. Read More

Education Camp For Poor

Few days back, we ran poverty relief camp in Towndown Hall, Newyork. We received and honored our chief guest and started our camp grantly. We collected the funds from our beloved donors. In the end of campaign. Read More

Donate Now To Orphan Children

We are raising our hands to help orphan children in the world. To show mercy on helpless children, please donate by clicking below button. Donate Now

Gallery

Our Latest News

Best Complementary

Relief Camp in December

We are planned to run a relief camp in the upcoming month. Its going to be a great successfull by the people having god hearted. In this camp, we will receive fund, food, garment materials. We are planned to run a relief camp in the upcoming month. Its going to be a great successfull by the people having god hearted. In this camp, we will receive fund, food, garment materials.

Our Volunteers

Jessica Joe

Jessica Joe is our beloved kind hearted volunteers having great heart to help helpless. In her busy schedule, she helping people regularly. She raising few children for their food and education. She wants to help people inregardless of the religion and countries.

John Peter

John Peter is lovely guy who is having great ideas to help people irrespective of the money but technically. By having his guide, we can easily reach and teach uneducated people. He is techie and his techniques are easy to understand for people who all are uneducated.

Best Moment In Our Life

Upcoming Events

Testimonial

"Charity is one of the best NGO in the world. Their motivation towards helpless people is great. I wish them to have great futue and ongoing. I want to regularly work with them."

Mark Davis, Social Activist

We collected the funds and other garment materials from our beloved donors. Using the fund and others, we help the people of flood affected area othe village in africa and ... Read More

Faq

Who We Are and Why?

We are group of volunteers and have a properly registered NGO. Please visit our site to get more details.

How To Become Volunteers?

To become volunteer of our NGO, visit our website or our office which is in 11, HOWENT Road, NewYork

How Can I Donate To The Orphanage?

You can donate by using our website or can provide check and mailed to our address. We welcome you.

<label> Your Name (required) [text* your-name] </label>

<label> Your Message [textarea your-message] </label>
[submit "Send"] 1 Charity "[your-subject]" [your-name] <wordpress@pennyblacktemplates.com> wordpress@pennyblacktemplates.com From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject]
Message Body: [your-message]
-- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Charity (http://pennyblacktemplates.com/demo/wp/charity) Reply-To: [your-email]

There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short. The date format is incorrect. The date is before the earliest one allowed. The date is after the latest one allowed. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The file is too big. There was an error uploading the file. The number format is invalid. The number is smaller than the minimum allowed. The number is larger than the maximum allowed. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Your entered code is incorrect. The e-mail address entered is invalid. The URL is invalid. The telephone number is invalid.
